Posted By: BantCaptain (7/22/2010 4:02:49 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Unlike almost all of you I do not judge a card by its art work. The aspect has NO effect on the game.   
  
It's a really great card for either standard or extended.  
  
3 drop for a 2/2 that gives +1/+1 to all your vamps? That's a good thing. The last ability seems tricky but if people haven't noticed the extremely cheap vamps you can use for this? Not only that but you can target your OWN creature. Control doesn't change but the creature is now a freaking VAMPIRE! Grave Titan can easily become a VAMPIRE.  
  
ALSO none of you have seemed to notice this freak can TAKE ANY ELDRAZI!?  
INCLUDING EMRAKUL!
posts.html:

Posted By: Faust-The-Desolate (7/8/2010 6:10:01 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Absolutely terrible art. When you think "Captivating Vampire", the first thing that comes to mind is a beautiful vampire lady, a seductress. On the more masculine side of things, you think of a vampire along the lines of Sorin Markov, charming and aristocratic. The art on this card is neither of those things - it looks Severus fuckdamn Snape crossed with an emo kid who hasn't washed his hair in months.  
  
Just awful. I wouldn't play this outside of a draft/sealed where for some reason I ended up with this guy and a bunch of vamps and nothing else useful.
